summary: Robert S. Hanley, Jr., M.D., surrendered his medical license after failing to comply with a consent order that mandated participation in a professional rehabilitation program (MPRP), which stemmed from prior charges of sexual misconduct with a patient. He violated the order by failing to complete a required evaluation and withdrawing from MPRP. To avoid prosecution for these violations, he voluntarily surrendered his license, which was accepted by the Board.
